answer: Common symptoms of Diabetes include frequent urination, excessive thirst, fatigue.
मधुमेह के सामान्य लक्षण हैं बार-बार पेशाब आना, ज्यादा प्यास लगना, और थकान।
Dengue ke symptoms hote hain high fever, severe headache, joint and muscle pain, skin rash.
Malaria symptoms include fever, chills, sweating, headache, nausea and vomiting.
Typhoid ke symptoms hain sustained fever, weakness, stomach pain, headache, aur loss of appetite.
Common cold symptoms include runny nose, sneezing, sore throat, mild body ache.
Asthma ke symptoms hote hain difficulty in breathing, wheezing, coughing especially at night.
Heart attack symptoms include chest pain, shortness of breath, sweating, nausea, pain in left arm.
TB ke symptoms hain persistent cough for more than 2 weeks, weight loss, fever, night sweats.
COVID-19 symptoms include fever, cough, loss of taste or smell, difficulty breathing, body ache.
Cholera ke symptoms hote hain watery diarrhea, vomiting, dehydration, muscle cramps.
Jaundice ke symptoms hote hain yellowing of eyes and skin, fatigue, abdominal pain, dark urine.
Pneumonia symptoms include fever, cough with phlegm, chest pain, shortness of breath.
Migraine ke symptoms hote hain severe headache, nausea, sensitivity to light and sound.
Hypertension ke symptoms hamesha clear nahi hote, lekin headache, dizziness aur blurred vision ho sakte hain.
Anemia symptoms include fatigue, pale skin, weakness, shortness of breath.

query: Cancer ke early symptoms kya hai?
answer: Cancer ke early symptoms hote hain unexplained weight loss, fatigue, persistent cough, abnormal lumps.
Hepatitis symptoms include fatigue, nausea, abdominal pain, jaundice, dark urine.
Skin allergy ke symptoms hote hain itching, redness, rash, swelling.
Kidney stone symptoms include severe back pain, pain during urination, blood in urine, nausea.
Arthritis ke symptoms hote hain joint pain, stiffness, swelling, aur movement mein problem.
Stroke symptoms include sudden weakness, difficulty speaking, loss of balance, blurred vision.
Depression ke symptoms hote hain sadness, loss of interest, fatigue, sleep disturbances.
Anxiety symptoms include excessive worry, restlessness, increased heart rate, sweating.
Epilepsy ke symptoms hote hain seizures, sudden shaking, loss of awareness.
Appendicitis symptoms include severe abdominal pain (right side), nausea, vomiting, fever.
Polio ke symptoms hote hain fever, fatigue, headache, vomiting, paralysis in severe cases.
Obesity ka main symptom hai excessive body fat, aur related issues jaise shortness of breath, fatigue.
Allergy ke symptoms hote hain sneezing, runny nose, itching, watery eyes, rash.
Parkinson’s ke symptoms hote hain tremors, stiffness, slow movement, balance problems.
Chickenpox ke symptoms hote hain itchy skin rash, red spots, fever, tiredness.
Measles symptoms include fever, cough, runny nose, inflamed eyes, red rash all over body.

query: HIV ke early symptoms kya hai?
answer: HIV ke early symptoms hote hain fever, sore throat, fatigue, swollen lymph nodes.
Alzheimer’s symptoms include memory loss, confusion, difficulty completing tasks, personality changes.
Gastric ulcer ke symptoms hote hain stomach pain, bloating, nausea, vomiting.
Insomnia symptoms include difficulty falling asleep, waking up frequently, daytime fatigue.
Leprosy ke symptoms hote hain skin patches, numbness, weakness in hands and feet.
Scabies symptoms include intense itching, small blisters, rash especially at night.
Conjunctivitis ke symptoms hote hain redness in eyes, itching, watery discharge, irritation.
Sinus infection symptoms include headache, facial pain, nasal congestion, cough.
Tuberculosis symptoms include persistent cough, chest pain, fever, night sweats, weight loss.

query: TB ke lakshan kya hote hai?
answer: टीबी के लक्षण हैं लगातार खांसी, छाती में दर्द, रात को पसीना आना और वजन घटना।
Migraine symptoms include throbbing headache, nausea, sensitivity to light and sound.
Thyroid ke symptoms hote hain weight change, fatigue, hair loss, mood swings.
Asthma symptoms include shortness of breath, chest tightness, wheezing, coughing.

query: Jaundice ke symptoms kya hote hai?
answer: Jaundice ke symptoms hote hain skin aur eyes pe yellow color, fatigue, loss of appetite.
COVID-19 symptoms include fever, cough, loss of smell/taste, difficulty breathing.

Hypertension ke symptoms me headache, dizziness, chest pain aur nosebleeds ho sakte hain.
BP ke lakshan hote hain sir dard, chakkar aana, thakan aur kabhi-kabhi chest pain.
Cholera symptoms include watery diarrhea, vomiting, muscle cramps, dehydration.

Typhoid symptoms include prolonged fever, abdominal pain, weakness, loss of appetite.

Malaria symptoms include high fever, chills, sweating, headache, nausea.

query: Malaria ke lakshan kya hote hai?

Pneumonia symptoms include cough with phlegm, fever, chills, and difficulty breathing.

Kidney stone symptoms include severe back pain, blood in urine, nausea, frequent urination.

query: Kidney stone ke lakshan kya hai?

UTI symptoms include burning sensation during urination, frequent urge, cloudy urine.

Anemia symptoms include fatigue, pale skin, dizziness, shortness of breath.

query: Khoon ki kami ke lakshan kya hai?

Meningitis symptoms include headache, stiff neck, fever, sensitivity to light.

query: Meningitis ke lakshan kya hote hai?
answer: मेनिन्जाइटिस के लक्षण हैं सिरदर्द, गर्दन अकड़ना, बुखार और रोशनी से तकलीफ।

query: Swine flu ke lakshan kya hote hai?

query: Daad ke lakshan kya hote hai?

query: Hepatitis B ke lakshan kya hai?

Hepatitis C symptoms include loss of appetite, nausea, jaundice, abdominal pain.

query: Hepatitis C ke lakshan kya hai?

Zika virus symptoms include fever, rash, joint pain, red eyes, headache.

query: Zika virus ke lakshan kya hote hai?

Black fungus symptoms include facial swelling, black lesions, fever, chest pain, shortness of breath.

आर्थराइटिस के लक्षण हैं जोड़ों में दर्द, सूजन और हिलाने में कठिनाई।
